entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon.
